digitalDescription.fieldData: Buy ONE(1) of Starbucks Espresso 4-pack (Valid on 6.5 fl. oz. 4 pack).

couponDisclaimer.fieldData: CONSUMER: Only one coupon per purchase. You pay sales tax and/or deposit charge, where applicable. Coupon may not be assigned, transferred or reproduced. Any other use constitutes fraud. Cash value 1/100. RETAILER: We will reimburse you for the face value plus 8 handling if you and the consumer have complied with our Coupon Redemption Policy available at the redemption address. Mail coupons to: Inmar Brand Solutions Dept. 12000 Mfr Rcv Office 801 UNION PACIFIC BLVD STE 5 LAREDO TX 78045-9475. Coupon expires 12/27/2022.

details.name: Starbucks Espresso 4-pack
details.description: API Automation $2.00 OFF when you buy ONE(1) Starbucks Espresso 4-pack
